meanings.definition: A group of alcohols derived from propane, including isopropanol and n-propanol.
meanings.sent1: Propanols are commonly used in cleaning products.
meanings.sent2: I spilled some propanols while trying to refill the bottle.
meanings.sent3: The propanols in the lab were having a party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The propanols in the solution worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of propanols lingered in the air long after the spill.
